inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed and intact invasive ductal carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with a single measurable mass less than or equal to 3 cm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women who are awaiting the surgical removal of breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Surgery is scheduled at least 2 weeks from the time of recruitment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to come to MDACC or Fudan University Cancer Hospital (FUCH) for 5 consecutive days to receive the EQT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 18 years of age or older because the assessment tools are not validated for use in minors.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior or planned neoadjuvant treatment with chemotherapy or radiotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of hyperlipidemia and MI in family members, but no underlying disease. Smokes 15 cigarettes per day and drinks a beer per day.
